mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coaching_RFQ_result AS r INNER JOIN coach_user AS c ON c.coach_user_email = r.coach_user_email WHERE r.coaching_RFQ_result_code = #{resultCode};
mapper.update: UPDATE coaching_RFQ SET coaching_category_code= #{coachingCategoryCode}, total_plan_code = #{totalPlanCode}, plan_detail_code = null, coaching_RFQ_day = #{coachingRFQDay}, coaching_RFQ_start_date= #{coachingRFQStartDate}, coaching_RFQ_end_date= #{coachingRFQEndDate}, coaching_RFQ_wishful_thinking= #{coachingRFQWishfulThinking} WHERE coaching_RFQ_code = #{coachingRFQCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coaching_RFQ (coaching_RFQ_code ,coaching_category_code ,total_plan_code ,plan_detail_code ,coach_user_email ,user_email ,coach_classification ,coaching_RFQ_start_date ,coaching_RFQ_end_date ,coaching_RFQ_day ,coaching_RFQ_wishful_thinking ,coaching_RFQ_request_date ) VALUES( sf_createCode(), #{coachingCategoryCode}, #{totalPlanCode}, null, #{coachUserEmail}, #{userEmail}, #{coachClassification}, #{coachingRFQStartDate}, #{coachingRFQEndDate}, #{coachingRFQDay}, #{coachingRFQWishfulThinking}, CURDATE() );
mapper.select: #견적요청 내역 전체 SELECT * FROM coaching_RFQ WHERE coaching_RFQ.user_email = #{sessionEmail};

#진행상태가 견적요청상태 단계인 내역 조회 SELECT coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_code as coachingRFQCode ,coaching_RFQ.coaching_category_code as coachingCategoryCode ,coaching_RFQ.total_plan_code as totalPlanCode ,coaching_RFQ.plan_detail_code as planDetailCode ,coaching_RFQ.coach_user_email as coachUserEmail ,coaching_RFQ.user_email as userEmail ,coaching_RFQ.coach_classification as coachClassification ,coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_start_date as coachingRFQStartDate ,coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_end_date as coachingRFQEndDate ,coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_day as coachingRFQDay ,coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_wishful_thinking as coachingRFQWishfulThinking ,coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_request_date as coachingRFQRequestDate FROM coaching_RFQ LEFt JOIN coaching_RFQ_result ON coaching_RFQ.coaching_RFQ_code = coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_RFQ_code WHERE coaching_RFQ.user_email = #{sessionEmail} AND coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_RFQ_code IS null;

#진행상태가 견적결과 단계인 내역 조회 SELECT coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_RFQ_result_code ,coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_category_code ,coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_RFQ_code ,coaching_RFQ_result.total_plan_code ,coaching_RFQ_result.plan_detail_code ,coaching_RFQ_result.coach_user_email ,coaching_RFQ_result.user_email ,coaching_RFQ_result_cost ,coaching_RFQ_result_day ,coaching_RFQ_result_costPerHour ,coaching_RFQ_result_time ,coaching_RFQ_result_method ,coaching_RFQ_result_area ,coaching_RFQ_result_agreement ,coaching_RFQ_result_service_start_date ,coaching_RFQ_result_service_end_date ,coaching_RFQ_result_register_date from coaching_RFQ_result LEFt JOIN coaching_apply_and_payment ON coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_RFQ_result_code = coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_RFQ_result_code WHERE coaching_RFQ_result.user_email = #{sessionEmail} AND coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_RFQ_result_code IS NULL;

#진행상태가 신청 및 결제 단계인 내역 조회 SELECT coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_apply_and_payment_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_category_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_RFQ_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_RFQ_result_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coach_user_email ,coaching_apply_and_payment.total_plan_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.plan_detail_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.user_email ,coaching_apply_and_payment.all_payment_connect_group_code ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_apply_and_payment_service_start_date ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_apply_and_payment_service_end_date ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_apply_cost ,coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_progress_status ,coaching_apply_and_payment_register_date ,payment_code from coaching_RFQ_result inner JOIN coaching_apply_and_payment ON coaching_apply_and_payment.coaching_RFQ_result_code = coaching_RFQ_result.coaching_RFQ_result_code WHERE coaching_RFQ_result.user_email = #{sessionEmail};
